lead_paragraph: Rose, a white rat who survived a roadside dumping and poison, died at home, just four days after she started acting in “The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time.”
snippet: Rose, a white rat who survived a roadside dumping and poison, died at home, just four days after she started acting in “The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time.”

headline.main: Rat Who Escaped Peril and Made It on Broadway Dies in a Fall
headline.print_headline: Rat Who Briefly Starred on Broadway Dies in Fall

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time (Play)

abstract: Owner announces death of albino rat named Rose; rodent was profiled in The New York Times because she was preparing to play part in play The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time.
